title: Percentage of U.S. population who are veterans in 2018 , by age and gender
summary: In 2018 , there were about 13.73 million males and 1.75 million females between the ages of 55_to_64_years and living in U.S. , which was the most out of any veterans 2018 .
The next largest veterans 2018 was between the ages of 65_to_74_years and , with 31.89 % males and 1.22 % females .

Canadian demographics The average veterans of the Canadian U.S. population was about 40.8 18_to_34_years in 2018 , with Newfoundland and Labrador having the oldest average population , and Nunavut having the youngest average population .
gold: This graph displays the percentage of Americans who were veterans in 2018 , distinguished by age and gender.
In 2018 , 47.51 percent of the male Americans , aged 75 years and over , were veterans .
